alert.note: Alert for Bennett; Oglala Lakota (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 4:30AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Oglala Lakota and northwestern Bennett Counties through 500 AM MDT... At 430 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 3 miles southwest of Yellow Bear Canyon, or 20 miles northwest of Martin, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Yellow Bear Canyon around 440 AM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Allen and Swett. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
